metadata.description: Comprehensive knowledge base of Soongsil University Reality Lab

general.title: Home
general.content: Welcome to the SSU Reality Lab! Youngjae Choi, Hyunsuh Koh, Hojae Jeong, and ByungKwan Chae's paper has been accepted to BMVC 2025! Congrats! Dowon Kim, Chaewoo Lim, Sungyong Park, and Sangmin Lee got 1st place in ARNOLD Challenge at CVPR 2025 Embodied AI Workshop! Congrats! Sangmin Lee is starting a software internship for Automated Driving at Qualcomm! Congrats! Sangmin Lee and Sungyong Park's paper has been accepted to CVPR 2025! Congrats! Advancing AI to Understand Reality Reality Lab was founded in 2023 at Soongsil University under the supervision of Prof. Heewon Kim. The Reality Lab explores the intersection of artificial intelligence and the physical world. We develop intelligent systems that learn from real-world perception and interactionjust like humans. Our research spans robotics, computer vision, machine learning, and multimodal language understanding, with applications across AI+X domains such as healthcare. Jul 26 2025 Publication Mar 24, 2025 Internship Feb 26, 2025 Publication Home News MembersFacultyStudentsAlumni PublicationInternationalDomestic Courses Home News MembersFacultyStudentsAlumni PublicationInternationalDomestic Courses Home News MembersFacultyStudentsAlumni PublicationInternationalDomestic Courses Home News MembersFacultyStudentsAlumni PublicationInternationalDomestic Courses

The Reality Lab explores the intersection of artificial intelligence and the physical world. We develop intelligent systems that learn from real-world perception and interactionjust like humans. news.title: News
news.content: News Youngjae Choi, Hyunsuh Koh, Hojae Jeong, and ByungKwan Chae's paper has been accepted to BMVC 2025! Congrats! Dowon Kim, Chaewoo Lim, Sungyong Park, and Sangmin Lee got 1st place in ARNOLD Challenge at CVPR 2025 Embodied AI Workshop! Congrats! Jun 4, 2025 Awards Yeri Kim and Seoyoung Kim's paper has been accepted to PLOS One! Congrats! Sangmin Lee is starting a software internship for Automated Driving at Qualcomm! Congrats! Seunghyun Oh's paper has been accepted to ICT Express! Congrats! Sangmin Lee and Sungyong Park's paper has been accepted to CVPR 2025! Congrats! Sooyoung Choi and Sungyong Park's paper has been accepted to AAAI 2025! Congrats! Prof. Heewon Kim has been nominated as an outstanding reviewer for BMVC 2024! Three master students joined our lab! Welcome! Our team won an NRF grant! Aug 28, 2024 Grants Sangmin Lee and Sungyong Park got 3rd place in ARNOLD Challenge at CVPR 2024 Embodied AI Workshop! Congrats! Jun 18, 2024 Awards Our lab is supported by the Graduate School of Metaverse program! Our lab is supported by the Graduate School of Security program! Our lab is supported by the National Program of Excellence in Software! Six master students joined our lab! Welcome! One paper has been accepted to TIP (IF: 11.041)! One paper has been accepted to TPAMI (IF: 24.314)! 17 students started 2023 summer internships at our lab! One paper has been accepted to ICLR 2023! [PDF] [C1] Bee Lim, Sanghyun Son, Heewon Kim, Seungjun Nah, and Kyoung Mu Lee, "Enhanced Deep Residual Networks for Single Image Super-Resolution," 2nd NTIRE: New Trends in Image Restoration and Enhancement workshop and challenge on super-resolution in conjunction with CVPR 2017. (Challenge Winners, Best Paper Award of Workshop) [paper (PDF)] [code] [slide] In computer vision, the top three conferences (CVPR, ICCV, ECCV) are considered more important and have a greater impact than most SCI journals. Oral presentations have a highly competitive acceptance rate of about 4% and poster presentations about 20%. According to the recent survey of CiteScholar, their impact factors are CVPR 5.97, ECCV 5.91, and ICCV 5.05, which correspond to the top 4% - 7% of all computer science journals and conferences. Note that CVPR is the only conference proceedings listed in the top 100 publications in Google Scholar and is ranked No.1 in Computer Science and Electrical Engineering.IEEE TPAMI and IJCV have among the highest ISI impact factors across all computer science categories. PAMI is one of the top-ranked publications in IEEE and in all computer science journals. 컴퓨터비젼 분야에서는 CVPR, ICCV, ECCV의 3대 주요학술대회 논문 발표가 대다수의 SCI 저널 논문 발표보다 중요하게 평가됨. 이러한 3대 주요학회의 통상 논문 채택률은 23-28% 정도로 매우 경쟁이 심하고, 영향력(Impact Factor) 지수도 CVPR 5.97, ECCV 5.91, ICCV 5.05 로서 컴퓨터 분야의 모든 저널과 학술대회의 상위 4-7%에 해당됨.특히 CVPR의 경우 Google Scholar의 영향력지수 상위 100대 출판물 중 유일한 학술대회 논문집 (83위)이며 Computer Science 및 Electrical Engineering 분야에서 가장 높은 영향력지수를 보이고 있음.컴퓨터비젼 분야 저널의 경우, IEEE TPAMI 와 IJCV 가 top 저널들이며, PAMI는 모든 IEEE 출판물, 그리고 Electrical Engineering 및 Artificial Intelligence 분야 출판물 중 가장 높은 영향력지수를 가지고 있는 저널 중 하나임. [PDF] [C1] Bee Lim, Sanghyun Son, Heewon Kim, Seungjun Nah, and Kyoung Mu Lee, "Enhanced Deep Residual Networks for Single Image Super-Resolution," 2nd NTIRE: New Trends in Image Restoration and Enhancement workshop and challenge on super-resolution in conjunction with CVPR 2017. (Challenge Winners, Best Paper Award of Workshop) [paper (PDF)] [code] [slide] In computer vision, the top three conferences (CVPR, ICCV, ECCV) are considered more important and have a greater impact than most SCI journals. Oral presentations have a highly competitive acceptance rate of about 4% and poster presentations about 20%. According to the recent survey of CiteScholar, their impact factors are CVPR 5.97, ECCV 5.91, and ICCV 5.05, which correspond to the top 4% - 7% of all computer science journals and conferences. Note that CVPR is the only conference proceedings listed in the top 100 publications in Google Scholar and is ranked No.1 in Computer Science and Electrical Engineering.IEEE TPAMI and IJCV have among the highest ISI impact factors across all computer science categories. PAMI is one of the top-ranked publications in IEEE and in all computer science journals. 컴퓨터비젼 분야에서는 CVPR, ICCV, ECCV의 3대 주요학술대회 논문 발표가 대다수의 SCI 저널 논문 발표보다 중요하게 평가됨. 이러한 3대 주요학회의 통상 논문 채택률은 23-28% 정도로 매우 경쟁이 심하고, 영향력(Impact Factor) 지수도 CVPR 5.97, ECCV 5.91, ICCV 5.05 로서 컴퓨터 분야의 모든 저널과 학술대회의 상위 4-7%에 해당됨.특히 CVPR의 경우 Google Scholar의 영향력지수 상위 100대 출판물 중 유일한 학술대회 논문집 (83위)이며 Computer Science 및 Electrical Engineering 분야에서 가장 높은 영향력지수를 보이고 있음.컴퓨터비젼 분야 저널의 경우, IEEE TPAMI 와 IJCV 가 top 저널들이며, PAMI는 모든 IEEE 출판물, 그리고 Electrical Engineering 및 Artificial Intelligence 분야 출판물 중 가장 높은 영향력지수를 가지고 있는 저널 중 하나임.
